issue.title: What is the structure of the final?

content.raw:
I think that the time lag is going to be very limiting. I do not see how tele-op is going to work. semi-autonomous seems like the way to go. Use most of the bandwidth to receive telemetry and then send an occasional command to the robot.

Here is a little tidbit that may be of interest. Check out item 2.3 from this page about tf. http://wiki.ros.org/tf/Design
content.html:
I think that the time lag is going to be very limiting. I do not see how tele-op is going to work. semi-autonomous seems like the way to go. Use most of the bandwidth to receive telemetry and then send an occasional command to the robot.

Here is a little tidbit that may be of interest. Check out item 2.3 from this page about tf. http://wiki.ros.org/tf/Design
